name: Two Truths and a Lie
description:
A little game made for the August 2019 Community Game Jam. 

It is by no means a completely fleshed out game. You can ascend vertical walls by repeatedly pressing the jump key. I left it in intentionally because the platforming controls aren't good enough to avoid all the obstacles without it.

Controls: 

Move left and right with A and D keys or arrow keys

Jump with Space

Go through door at the end by pressing W or up key
